title: Do i get demoted if i don't play ranked until the season is over
body: Hi i wonder if i will get demoted to silver V if i don't play ranked until this season is over or if i lose Ip when not playing. But i just go to gold V so do i demote or can i still be gold without playing

replies.body: I am going to play ranked now, in euw. But after January 2nd, I have to stop playing LoL for another 6 months or so... my exams. So, if I am in Silver III, and I don't play for 6 months, what exactly will happen to my rank?

You won't be demoted to silver by not playing for a certain amount of time. [**Decay **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3)only kicks in for Platinum, Diamond, Master, and Challenger. If you hit Gold and don't play for the rest of the season you'll still be in Gold!
